title: Bug 50059: Resources not served from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources when metadatacomplete="true" is set in web.xml
description: The resources are not served from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources if the metadatacomplete="true" attribute is set in the web.xml file. To reproduce the issue, create a Servlet 3.0 web application (named 'foo') and set the metadatacomplete="true" attribute on the webapp element in the /WEBINF/web.xml file.
OB: Create a Servlet 3.0 web application (named 'foo') with metadatacomplete="true" attribute set on the webapp element in the /WEBINF/web.xml file.
EB: The jar file (named 'bar.jar') should be placed in the /WEBINF/lib directory.
SR: Serve the resources from /WEBINF/lib/{.jar}/METAINF/resources even when metadatacomplete="true" is set in the web.xml file.
